Plot: Commanded by her aunt, the dark Queen Andais, to conceive a child as heir to the throne, Meredith Gentry, a half-mortal, half-faerie princess, returns to Los Angeles, only to find herself and her lovers trapped between the dark and light faerie courts and human law.
Characters: Meredith "Merry" Gentry, Frost (Killing Frost), Sholto, Kitto, Doyle (Queen's Darkness), Rhys (Cromm Crauch), Galen (A Kiss of Shadows), Holly, Ash
